text: Lizzie Clarijs (born 1996) is a Dutch softball player. After playing with Terrasvogels she moved to Tex Town Tigers in 2021, playing in the Golden League, the highest division in the Netherlands. She is member of the Netherlands women's national softball team. With the national team she became European champion at the 2022 Women's Softball European Championship. ==References== Category:1996 births Category:Living people Category:Dutch softball players Category:Sportswomen
title: Lizzie Clarijs
